env.name: TZ
env.label: TZ
env.description: Specify a timezone to use for example America/New_York

env.name: APP_KEY
env.label: APP_KEY
env.description: Key used to encrypt and decrypt data. You can generate a key at https://speedtest-tracker.dev

env.name: SPEEDTEST_SCHEDULE
env.label: SPEEDTEST_SCHEDULE
env.description: Cron expression used to run speedtests on a scheduled basis. Default is every hour. For more information on cron schedules, see https://crontab.guru/

env.name: PRUNE_RESULTS_OLDER_THAN
env.label: PRUNE_RESULTS_OLDER_THAN
env.description: Set the value to greated than zero to prune stored results. This value should be represented in days.

description: Run a Speedtest every hour and graph the results.
name: speedtest-tracker
title: Speedtest Tracker
